content: *****combo deals*** **buy 3 or more patterns & receive 20% off coupon code save20% buy 5 or more patterns & receive 30% off coupon code save30% buy 10 or more patterns & receive 40% off coupon code save40%**** do you love textured hats then you will absolutely love this crochet pattern using puff stitches did you notice the brim don t you think the stitch perfectly complements the bulky texture i used lionbrand wool ease for the hats it makes the right kind of puff stitches not too bulky colors used for the samples are fisherman and rose heather the furry pom pom and the metal buttons add a nice touch a tutorial for making your own furry pom pom in just under a dollar will be coming up on my blog shortly
